Matrix

    • Uses of Matrix in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Matrix Matrix.add(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Adds elements of two matrices with the same dimensions and returns the sum.
      static Matrix Matrix.dot(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Returns the dot product between mxn and nxk matricies.
      static Matrix Matrix.fromArrary(double[] arr)
      Returns a vector matrix based on a 1D Array
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getBias_HO()
      Gets the Bias vector from hidden to output layers
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getBias_IH()
      Gets the Bias vector from input to hidden layers
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getHidden()
      Gets the Hidden Matrix object
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getInput()
      Gets the Input matrix object
      Matrix Matrix.getInverse()
      Returns the inverse of the calling Matrix object
      * Currently only works with 2x2 Matricies!
      Matrix Matrix.getMinorMatrix(int iRow, int jCol)
      Returns a minor matrix Aij based on matrix passed in
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getOutput()
      Gets the Output matrix object
      Matrix Matrix.getTranspose()
      Returns a transposed matrix based on calling object
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getWeights_HO()
      Gets the Weight matrix from hidden to output layers
      Matrix NeuralNetwork.getWeights_IH()
      Gets the Weight matrix from input to hidden layers
      static Matrix Matrix.mult(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Returns the Hadamard product of two matricies.
      static Matrix Matrix.subtract(Matrix a, Matrix b)
      Subtracts elements of two matrices with the same dimensions and returns the sum.
